settings.code:
<style>#MainContent>section:nth-child(2) {
    display: none;
}

.t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-btn-icon use {
    display: none;
}

.t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-btn-icon {
    background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play_normal.svg?v=1693532989') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
}

.t4s-video-popup-inline button:hover .t4s-btn-icon {
    background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play.svg?v=1691737328') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
}

.t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-content-position p:nth-child(2) {
    background: linear-gradient(99deg, #17EDB1 40.03%, #078AE8 96.48%);
    background-clip: text;
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}

.section_box {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: 200px;
}

section {
    background-color: #000000;
}

section p {
    margin: 0;
}

.mol_text {
    display: none;
}

/* Top Buy */
.top_buy {
    position: absolute;
    top: 100px;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 999;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}

.top_buy .top_content {
    max-width: 1280px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 13px 0;
}

.top_buy .top_content p {
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 20px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin: 0;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-right: 40px;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth span:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #D2D2D7;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth span.active {
    color: #D2D2D7;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a {
    display: inline-block;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #000000;
    padding: 5px 20px;
    background: #03F2A6;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 40px;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a:hover {
    background: #00cc88;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button:hover .shop_popup {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: auto;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 30px;
    padding-top: 30px;
    pointer-events: none;
    opacity: 0;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box {
    width: 165px;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 0 10px;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 14px;
    color: #747476;
    padding: 5px 0;
    text-decoration: none;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a img {
    max-width: 26px;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:nth-child(1) {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #D2D2D7;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:hover {
    color: #000000;
}

.top_50 {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0 !important;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    border-bottom: 1 solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    animation: top-animeit .5s linear;
}

@keyframes top-animeit {
    0% {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
    }

    100% {
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

.top_50 .top_content {
    border: none;
}

.section_1 .img_list {
    position: relative;
    height: 596px;
}

.section_1 .mobile_img_list {
    display: none;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list {
    position: absolute;
    border-radius: 8px;
    overflow: hidden;
}


.section_1 .img_list .list_1 {
    top: 0;
    left: 334px;
    width: 532px;
    height: 357px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_2 {
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    width: 318px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_3 {
    top: 204px;
    right: 0;
    width: 318px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_4 {
    bottom: 0;
    right: 0;
    width: 318px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_5 {
    bottom: 0;
    right: 334px;
    width: 258px;
    height: 223px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_6 {
    bottom: 0;
    left: 334px;
    width: 258px;
    height: 223px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_7 {
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 318px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_8 {
    top: 204px;
    left: 167px;
    width: 151px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_9 {
    top: 204px;
    left: 0;
    width: 151px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_1 .img_list .list_10 {
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 318px;
    height: 188px;
}

.section_2 .section_box {
    text-align: center;
}

.section_2 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
}

.section_2 p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    margin: 16px 0 20px 0;
}

.section_2 .ports_bgm {
    position: relative;
}

.section_2 .ports_bgm .product_ports {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.section_2 .ports_bgm .product_ports .ports_text {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
}

.section_3 {
    padding-bottom: 200px;
}

.section_3 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 66px;
}

.section_3 p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 28px;
    margin: 16px 0 20px 0;
}


.section_4 {
    position: relative;
}

.section_4 .text_box {
    position: absolute;
    max-width: 555px;
    top: 170px;
    left: 18%;
}

.section_4 .text_box h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 66px;
}

.section_4 .text_box p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 28px;
    max-width: 780px;
    margin-top: 16px;
}

.section_4 img {
    width: 100%;
}

.section_4 .section_box {
    padding: 0;
}

.section_4 table {
    border: 1px solid #666;
    margin: 0;
}

.section_4 table h3 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 28px;
    padding: 14px 0;
}

.section_4 table th {
    text-align: center;
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 16px;
    font-weight: 400;
    padding: 12px 0;
}

.section_4 table th span {
    font-weight: 600;
}

.section_4 table .system_icon {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.section_4 table .system_icon img {
    width: 24px;
    margin-right: 8px;
}

.section_4 .revodok_note p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 20px 0 80px 0;
}

.section_4 .System_box {
    display: flex;
    gap: 26px;
}

.section_4 .System_box .item {
    max-width: 50%;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: #17171D;
    border-radius: 12px;
    text-align: center;
}

.section_4 .System_box .item p {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 24px;
    padding: 28px 0;
}

.section_4 .System_box .item img {
    height: 330px;
}

.section_5 .section_box {
    text-align: center;
}

.section_5 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
}

.section_5 p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    max-width: 820px;
    margin: 16px auto 40px auto;
}

.section_5 img {
    border-radius: 12px;
}

.section_6 {
    position: relative;
    padding-top: 200px;
}

.section_6 .text_box {
    position: absolute;
    max-width: 555px;
    bottom: 170px;
    left: 18%;
}

.section_6 .text_box h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 68px;
}

.section_6 .text_box h2 span {
    font-size: 80px;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, #CDD2FA 0%, #8691C7 100%);
    background-clip: text;
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}

.section_6 .text_box p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    margin-top: 16px;
}

.section_6 img {
    width: 100%;
}

.section_7 .section_box {
    text-align: center;
}

.section_7 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
}

.section_7 p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    max-width: 820px;
    margin: 16px auto 40px auto;
}

.section_7 img {
    border-radius: 12px;
}

.section_8 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    text-align: center;
}

.section_8 .system_list {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 20px;
}

.section_8 .system_list .item {
    border-radius: 12px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(1) {
    max-width: 767px;
}

.section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(2) {
    max-width: 412px;
}

.section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(3),
.section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(4) {
    max-width: 590px;
}

.section_9 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
    text-align: center;
}

.section_9 p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    margin: 16px auto 40px auto;
    text-align: center;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 80px;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists .left {
    max-width: 440px;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists .left h3 {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists .left ul {
    margin: 8px 0 80px 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists .left li {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/icon_391ab012-75c1-490e-9f5f-00134c63d127.svg?v=1702974739')top left no-repeat;
    padding-left: 24px;
    background-size: 16px 16px;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists .left p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 20px;
    text-align: left;
}

.section_9 .Compatible_lists .left p span {
    font-weight: 600;
}

/* specs */

.section_10 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
    margin-bottom: 60px;
}

.section_10 ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.section_10 .specs_list {
    display: flex;
    gap: 20px;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_item {
    max-width: 25%;
    text-align: center;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .select_box {
    width: 200px;
    position: relative;
    margin: 0 auto;

}

.section_10 .specs_list .select_box svg {
    position: absolute;
    top: 19px;
    right: 18px;
    z-index: 1;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .select_box span {
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    border-radius: 4px;
    padding: 13px 18px;
    line-height: normal;
    border: 1px solid #999;
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-align: left;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .product_title {
    position: absolute;
    top: 48px;
    left: 0;
    width: 200px;
    height: 192px;
    overflow-x: auto;
    border-radius: 0px 0px 4px 4px;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.10);
    display: none;
    text-align: center;
    z-index: 9;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .product_title li {
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 16px;
    padding: 16px 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    margin: 0 10px;
    transition: 0.3s 0.1s;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .product_title li.active {
    background: #FFF;
    color: #000;
    margin: 0;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .product_title li:hover {
    background: #FFF;
    color: #000;
    margin: 0;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box {
    position: relative;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box .product_specs {
    display: none;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box .product_specs.active {
    display: block;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li {
    height: 120px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li:nth-child(1) {
    height: auto;
    padding: 40px 0;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li img {
    padding: 0 28px;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li a {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 11px 29px;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 60px;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: normal;
    color: #000000;
    transition: .4s;
    margin-top: 40px;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li a:hover {
    background: #03F2A6;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li span {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 20px;
}

.section_10 .specs_list .specs_box li p {
    color: #757575;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 18px;
    margin: 12px auto 0 auto;
    min-width: 200px;
    max-width: 260px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
}

.section_11 h2 {
    color: #FFF;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 56px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 56px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.section_11 .section_box {
    padding: 200px 0;
}

.section_11 .text_box {
    padding: 60px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: 12px;
    background: #121212;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

.section_11 .text_box span {
    color: #FFF;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 16px;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    display: block;
}

.section_11 .text_box p {
    color: #999;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.section_11 .text_box .right_text span {
    margin-top: 40px;
}

.section_11 .text_box .right_text span:nth-child(1) {
    margin-top: 0;
}

@media(max-width:1440px) {}

@media(max-width:767px) {
    #MainContent>section:nth-child(1) {
        display: none;
    }

    #MainContent>section:nth-child(2) {
        display: block;
    }

    .section_box {
        padding: 80px 18px 0 18px;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .mol_text {
        display: block;
    }

    .pc_text {
        display: none;
    }

    /* Top Buy */
    .top_buy {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    }

    .top_buy .top_content {
        max-width: 100%;
        padding: 16px 0;
        margin: 0 18px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content p {
        font-size: 18px;
        line-height: 18px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
        font-size: 12px;
        margin-right: 12px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a {
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 12px;
        padding: 6px 15px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup {
        top: 20px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list {
        display: none;
    }

    .section_1 .mobile_img_list {
        display: block;
    }

    .section_2 .section_box {
        text-align: left;
    }

    .section_2 h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 34px;
    }

    .section_2 p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
        margin: 12px 0 20px 0;
    }

    .section_2 .ports_bgm {
        overflow-y: auto;
    }

    .section_2 .ports_bgm>picture img {
        max-width: 130%;
    }

    .section_2 .ports_bgm .product_ports {
        display: none;
    }

    .section_3 {
        padding-bottom: 80px;
    }

    .section_3 .section_box h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 34px;
    }

    .section_3 .section_box>p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
        margin: 12px 0 20px 0;
    }

    .section_4 .premium_bgc img {
        max-width: 100%;
    }

    .section_4 {
        padding: 68px 0 0 0;
    }

    .section_4 .text_box {
        top: 0;
        left: 18px;
    }

    .section_4 .text_box h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 34px;
    }

    .section_4 .text_box p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
        max-width: 210px;
        margin: 12px 0 0 0;
    }

    .section_4 .section_box {
        padding: 28px 18px 0 18px;
    }

    .section_4 table th {
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 16px;
        padding: 8px;
    }

    .section_4 table h3 {
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 20px;
    }

    .section_4 .revodok_note p {
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 18px;
        margin: 16px 0 40px 0;
    }

    .section_4 .System_box {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .section_4 .System_box .item {
        max-width: 100%;
        border-radius: 8px;
    }

    .section_4 .System_box .item img {
        height: auto;
    }

    .section_4 .System_box .item p {
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 16px;
        padding: 16px 0;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box {
        padding: 80px 0 0 0;
    }

    .section_5 h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 28px;
    }

    .section_5 img {
        border-radius: 0;
    }

    .section_5 p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
        text-align: left;
        margin: 28px 0 0 0;
        padding: 0 18px;
    }

    .section_6 {
        padding: 80px 0 44px 0;
    }

    .section_6 .text_box {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 18px;
        right: 18px;
    }

    .section_6 .text_box h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 28px;
    }

    .section_6 .text_box h2 span {
        font-size: 36px;
    }

    .section_6 .text_box p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
    }

    .section_7 .section_box {
        padding: 80px 0 0 0;
    }

    .section_7 h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 28px;
    }

    .section_7 img {
        border-radius: 0;
    }

    .section_7 p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
        text-align: left;
        margin: 28px 0 0 0;
        padding: 0 18px;
    }

    .section_8 .section_box {
        padding: 80px 0 0 0;
    }

    .section_8 h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 28px;
    }

    .section_8 .system_list {
        gap: 10px;
    }

    .section_8 .system_list .item {
        border-radius: 8px;
        max-height: 148px;
    }

    .section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(1) {
        max-width: calc(65.5% - 5px);
    }

    .section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(2) {
        max-width: calc(34.5% - 5px);
    }

    .section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(3),
    .section_8 .system_list div:nth-child(4) {
        max-width: calc(50% - 5px);
    }

    .section_9 h2 {
        font-size: 24px;
        line-height: 24px;
    }

    .section_9 p {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 22px;
        margin: 28px 0;

Revodok Max 213

Specs
Kaufen
Buy On Official Buy On Amazon

13 Anschlüsse, Erweiterte Möglichkeiten

Der Revodok Max mit 13 Anschlüssen bietet Konnektivität für jede Art von Workflow. Der Revodok Max verfügt über Thunderbolt 4-Anschlüsse, einen integrierten Display-Anschluss, mehrere USB-C- und A-Anschlüsse, SD/TF-Leser und weitere Anschlüsse für jeden Bedarf.

Thunderbolt 4
Das verbesserte Erlebnis

Der Revodok Max 213 verfügt über zwei nachgeschaltete Thunderbolt 4-Anschlüsse, die ein kristallklares, hochauflösendes Display und eine Hochgeschwindigkeits-NVME-SSD bieten.

Ein 8K- oder zwei
4K-Displays

Anschluss an ein einzelnes Display für 8K@30Hz Auflösung oder an zwei Displays für 4K@60Hz.

Revodok Max 213
System Display Video Anschlüsse
Thunderbolt 4 Display-Anschluss
Windows
Einfaches Display 8K@30Hz
Doppeltes Display 4K@60Hz
macOS
Einfaches Display 4K@60Hz
Doppeltes Display

Anmerkung:
Die oben genannten Daten wurden von den UGREEN-Labors gesammelt und unter speziellen, kontrollierten Bedingungen getestet, so dass die Ergebnisse variieren können.
Die Auflösung der Videoausgabe kann von der Videobandbreite des Laptops und der vom Bildschirm unterstützten maximalen Auflösung abhängen.

Zwei Bildschirme für Windows

Zwei Bildschirme für macOS

High-Speed-Laden

Halten Sie Laptops mit einer 90-Watt-Hochgeschwindigkeitsladung über den Thunderbolt 4-Anschluss geladen. Einer der USB-C-Anschlüsse an der Vorderseite kann jedes angeschlossene USB-Gerät mit bis zu 20 W Leistung versorgen.

Halten Sie Laptops mit einer 90-Watt-Hochgeschwindigkeitsladung über den Thunderbolt 4-Anschluss geladen. Einer der USB-C-Anschlüsse an der Vorderseite kann jedes angeschlossene USB-Gerät mit bis zu 20 W Leistung versorgen.

2,5-Gbit
Ethernet-Anschluss

Halten Sie Laptops mit einer 90-Watt-Hochgeschwindigkeitsladung über den Thunderbolt 4-Anschluss geladen.
Einer der USB-C-Anschlüsse an der Vorderseite kann jedes angeschlossene USB-Gerät mit bis zu 20 W Leistung versorgen.

SD/TF 4.0-Kartenleser

Die SD/TF 4.0-Kartenleser ermöglichen den einfachen Anschluss von SD-Karten und bieten schnelle Datenübertragungen mit Geschwindigkeiten von bis zu 312 MB/s.

Die SD/TF 4.0-Kartenleser ermöglichen den einfachen Anschluss von SD-Karten und bieten schnelle Datenübertragungen mit Geschwindigkeiten von bis zu 312 MB/s.

Verbessertes Kühlsystem

Universelle Kompatibilität

Der Thunderport 4 funktioniert mit allen modernen, gängigen Apple- und Windows-PCs, die über Thunderbolt 4, Thunderbolt 3 und USB-C-Anschlüsse verfügen.Der Revodok Max funktioniert auch mit gängigen iPad- und Windows-Tablets mit Thunderbolt- oder USB-C-Anschlüssen.

Kompatible Listen:

  • Thunderbolt 4, Thunderbolt 3, USB4, USB-C PC*
  • Intel Thunderbolt 3 Mac**
  • M1/M2/M3 Pro, M1/M2/M3 Max & M1/M2 Ultra Mac**
  • M1/M2/M3 Mac**
  • USB-C Windows-Tablet
  • Thunderbolt oder USB-C iPad

Anmerkung: *Benötigt Windows OS 10 (20H2) oder höher
**Erfordert macOS 11.4 (Big Sur) oder höher .M1/M2/M3-basierte Macs und Tablets können nur an ein einzelnes Display angeschlossen werden; Wenn sie an einen voll funktionsfähigen USB-C-Anschluss für ein externes Display angeschlossen sind, unterstützt die Dockingstation nur ein Display.
